title: Opening Inaccuracies Tool Released
description: A new analysis tool that imports your games and identifies recurring opening inaccuracies, helping you spot familiar patterns that quietly limit your progress.

title: Using Maia to Find Repertoire Gaps
description: An exploration of how Maia can be used to reveal gaps in your opening repertoire by comparing your move choices against human-like expectations.

title: Integrating Maia2 into My Chess Application
description: A technical overview of what Maia2 is, why it matters for chess training, and how it has been integrated into my application.
